pipelet-node.description: Delete temp folders of files which not be archived or purged

key-binding.alias: CurrentWorkflowComponentInstance.addMessage("An error occurred while removing/archiving old files.",'ERROR')

text-node.description: It makes no sense to SUSPEND the component. For dates it is not possible anymore to make the condition true and for a time the execution would be done on the next day on 00:00.
Wait until the point of time is reached.
TODO @aree: If the time lies near the end of day, it is possible, that the component never ends.
